title: The Adventures of Peggy White: The Baking Vigilante
summary: Peggy White, a 49-year-old baking enthusiast and sportswoman, discovers her ability to manipulate time while baking, using her powers to fight crime and bring justice throughout the week.
summaryGerman: Peggy White, eine 49-jährige Back- und Sportbegeisterte, entdeckt ihre Fähigkeit, während des Backens die Zeit zu manipulieren. Sie nutzt ihre Kräfte, um Verbrechen zu bekämpfen und Gerechtigkeit zu bringen.
summaryDutch: Peggy White, een 49-jarige bakliefhebber en sportvrouw, ontdekt haar vermogen om tijd te manipuleren tijdens het bakken. Ze gebruikt haar krachten om misdaad te bestrijden en rechtvaardigheid te brengen.
summaryFrench: Peggy White, passionnée de pâtisserie et sportive de 49 ans, découvre sa capacité à manipuler le temps pendant qu'elle cuisine. Elle utilise ses pouvoirs pour lutter contre le crime et apporter la justice.

story.text: Peggy bakes a mysterious cookie recipe found in an old family cookbook. Upon tasting it, she realizes she can pause time. Excited, she decides to harness this new power to help her community.
Harnessing her time-pausing abilities, Peggy stops a small robbery at a local store. She feels triumphant knowing she can make a difference.
After a heroic day, Peggy spends her time perfecting a cake for an upcoming competition, embracing the peace and solace of her kitchen.
Peggy encounters a new challenge: a strange chilling mist envelops her town. Suspicious, she investigates and finds a disguised villain causing havoc.
An epic showdown ensues between Peggy and the mist-creating villain in the middle of the town square. Using a clever combination of her baking skills and timing powers, she prevails.
Celebrating her victory, Peggy is joined by a charming admirer who has noticed her brave deeds. They spend a delightful evening discussing pastries and justice.
Peggy ends the week by hosting a community bake sale using her fame as the town’s hero to raise money for local charities.

ending: As the sun sets on a grateful town, Peggy White smiles, knowing her unique blend of baking and bravery continues to serve her community.
moral: No matter the tools at your disposal, creativity and a caring heart can make a superhero.
